div.p:
Conveys prohibited actions which an information custodian, receiver, or user is not permitted to perform unless otherwise authorized or permitted under specified circumstances. Examples:
prohibit redisclosure without consent directive
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li: Include codes from http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/ActCode where concept is-a RefrainPolicy

description.value: Conveys prohibited actions which an information custodian, receiver, or user is not permitted to perform unless otherwise authorized or permitted under specified circumstances. Examples: prohibit redisclosure without consent directive
